text:
Urmet S.p.A. is a company
involved in several activities

about different product
types, like intercom

devices, security devices,
and video surveillance devices.
And so, every day, we manage activities

about safety, security,
and monitoring features.

The challenges in particular focus
in order to simplify usability

of our products, adding day
by day, new innovative features,

thanks to a digital approach
in order to allow our customer

to get all the benefits
from the products.

For that reason, we really need
to differentiate, and it's a key

point of the company
being capable of assessing

or creating services out of transforming
our business into a digital way.

What becomes a critical point is being capable
of providing such services in a scalable way,

and with AWS, this gives us a possibility
of creating a better solution

for our customer,
and better services at the end of the day.
The results we obtain is
evaluated in a positive way,
and this evaluation

allows my team
to continue in this direction
using for the future AWS in a wide way,

and so we are very
happy about this performance.
